about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey at the helm of the legendary Owl Force, where courage, strategy, and teamwork reign supreme! Take command of a formidable squadron of heroic owls and engage in heart-pounding battles against the nefarious Darktail Order.

Prepare for an adventure like no other as you customize your ship to suit your tactical prowess, venture into uncharted realms teeming with mystery and danger, and uncover the enigmatic secrets hidden within the vast expanse of the galaxy.

With every decision you make, the fate of the universe hangs in the balance. Will you rise to the challenge and emerge victorious, or will darkness prevail? Join the Owl Force today and write your name among the stars

Features


Dynamic Environments in an Open World Galaxy: Pilot your ship across a stunning open-world environment. Explore all the galaxy has to offer, from unlocking missions within dense asteroid belts through forging alliances among the ethereal beauty of nebulae, all in spectacular detail.
Fast-Paced Space Combat: Engage in intense space dogfights, adapting your tactics as enemies aim to counter your every move.
Varied Mission Objectives with Event-Driven Quests: Diverse mission types including mining and escort missions, and dynamic boss battles. Unlock the power of ancient Light Shards and influence the galaxy’s fate through dynamic events that promise unique adventures and challenges.
Customizable Ships through Strategic Progression: Apply your earned Light Shards towards upgrading your spacecraft (and your friends’) with different weapons, shields, and abilities, in a system where every decision counts.
Engaging Storyline: Compelling narrative rich with mystery, intrigue, memorable characters and plot twists as you work to avert a galactic collapse.
Arcade-Style Gameplay: Accessible controls and arcade-style gameplay suitable to casual and hardcore gamers alike.
Unlockable Content: Uncover hidden levels and secret missions. Earn your reputation while collecting valuable rewards.
Immersive Soundtrack: Dynamic and immersive sound design and music to liven your gaming experience.



Will you rise to the challenge? Join Owl Force today and forge your legacy in a galaxy where freedom is the ultimate prize. Your adventure begins now.



Note for Press and Content Creators:
Visit our official website for additional information, promo materials and updates! Contact our press team directly for exclusive news on Owl Force.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4330 @ 3.50GHz / AMD FX-4330
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 6400 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 1500X@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 (8 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Lead the legendary Owl Force on an epic journey defending the galaxy against the nefarious Darktail Order. Take on missions, upgrade your ship, and engage in heart-pounding battles to uncover the hidden secrets of the universe.
